name: TaeKwon Pang
description:
Tae! Kwon! Pang!

It is a game that applies Taekwondo and can be easily enjoyed by men and women of all ages!

■ You can improve your math skills and even develop your mental arithmetic!

- Add, subtract, divide, multiply. It's an easy and difficult combination.

- I can achieve my own ranking.

■ Enjoy in many different modes!

- However, develop your math skills with your arms.

- From the white belt to the black belt, the more difficult it is! The more fun it is!

■ Exciting PVP mode that you can play with your friends.

- You can play with your friends in time attack mode.

- Faster than anyone else, faster than others, the pleasure you can feel with just a click!

■ Make your own profile with cute characters.

- Choose cute animal friends such as tigers, rabbits, and deer and make your own characters.

You can create it.

■ Get rid of stress with the thrill of a smash!!!
